body.name: HLKZONE Raincoat, [2 Pack] Reusable Rain Ponchos Portable EVA Rain Coats Packable Rain Jackets with Hood and Drawstring
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 24 mins
features: For Outdoor Activities: The rain ponchos for adults can be folded up into your pocket, almost no extra weight, you can use it whenever it rains suddenly. Suitable for travel, disney trip, amusement park, music festivals, outdoor stadium, water rides, marathon, fishing, hiking, boating, sporting events and etc, even a great cosplay costume.

Life Saver in Emergency: The elastic bands around wrists help to keep water from running down the arms into your sleeves when taking photos and videos. The hooded rain coat with a drawstring will keep your head and neck dry. The snap button closure make it easy to put on and take off. The long length of our clear raincoats to keep your pants dry as well as your upper body.

Quality and Practical: HLKZONE women’s raincoats are made of EVA, a high grade material, thickness of 0.15mm, almost 50% thicker than some others (most of them are 0.06mm or 0.08mm). Keep this waterproof emergency ponchos in the backpack/ house/ office/ car for some bad weather unexpectedly.

Reusable and Lightweight: Our raincoat for men is not only quick-drying but also can be recycled for long periods of time. Durable, tear-resistant, lightweight and wrinkle-free. You don’t need to carrying umbrellas or heavy, space-consuming rain ponchos when you pack light for a short trip.

One Size Fits Most: Sleeve length: 31.1 in, Chest: 55 in, Cloth length: 59 in (with hood 11.8 in), great length on the sleeves and down the legs. One size fits most, perfect for women and men. Lighter than a bulky umbrella and more freedom of movement. The unisex packable rain jacket is a good protector for not only travels, but also daily use.
body.description: SPECIFICATIONS: ● Material: High Grade EVA ● Package Contents: 2 Pack * Reusable Rain Ponchos for Adults ● Design: Drawstring Hood/ Long Sleeves/ Elastic Cuffs/ Snap Buttons ● Size: 59 by 27.5 inches (Flat Length x Flat Width) with hood, One Size fits most● People: Men/ Women/ Adults/ Family Pack● Colors: Clear White/ Dark Black/ Sky Blue/ Rose Pink/ Deep Grey/ Olive Green ● Occasions: Disney World/ Outdoor Concerts/ Theme Parks/ Travelling/ Hiking/ Walking the Dog/ Fishing/ Cycling/ Camping/ Water Rides/ Picnics/ Sporting Events A MUST-HAVE: ➤ Outerwear Rain Ponchos for Men and Women, No Smell and Harmless!!! ➤ Elastic Cuffs Sleeves and Over Knees Coverage Design is Great so that Water Not Drains onto Arms or Shoes. ➤ Soft But Flexible, Easy to Carry for Expected or Unexpected Rain at Any Time of the Year. CAUTIONS: ➤ Hand Washing Only; No dry-clean or machine-wash; Wipe with a damp towel or soft hand wash in lukewarm water; ➤ Minimize the cleaning times to prevent excessive damage; 2-3 times in one year is suitable; ➤ Place it in a cool ventilated shade place after washing to avoid exposing to the sun.What are you waiting for? Don't let the rain block your journey! Just Add to Cart and bring this reusable hooded rain coat back to your home!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sizes run small
reviews.reviewText: The raincoat material is thicker than usual on ponchos so it does not rip easily. I really like the elastic on the ends of the sleeves to keep them in place on your arm. I feel the coats do run a bit small according to the size charts. Buttoning it up it fits well in the chest area but getting to the hips and thighs it a little tight so while walking will be fine if I try to sit I have to unbutton the bottom button to make sure it doesn’t rip. All on all a great product for rainy days and protection at theme parks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great rain poncho.
reviews.reviewText: This poncho worked really well. The hood was plenty big and covered my head well when it was raining. it also has strings to tighten the hood. The only that might be a problem was the wrists had elastic and the elastic was snug on my wrists. My wrists are very small. I'm sure if it were a problem the elastic could be snipped. I did appreciate that there was elastic in the wrists, however.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Football fan protection
reviews.reviewText: I am 5'8 and on the thinner side. This thin rain coat did a pretty good job shielding me from getting wet at the college football game. Outdoor football stadiums are great when the weather is nice but tricky when it rains.Pros - GREAT length to keep my backside dry, elastic on the wrists, super light weight, hoodedCons - I got a little wet at the game since it was closed with snaps instead of a zipper. If the snaps could be moved so that there would be more space for an overlap I think that would help..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well for the price
reviews.reviewText: Worked great for our Disney trip, the elastic arm bands and front buttoning setup was much easier for us and the kids than the over the head poncho style on our last trip. Thicker material so no rips which is nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as pictured in photos
reviews.reviewText: The picture of the male on the left shows him wearing a large backpack with the coat over, it also shows no elastic on the wrists.This was too small, and the buttons ripped. It certainly could not fit a backpack underneath. On wrist elastic snapped, and due to it being too tight, I was able to just snap the other. Do not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight. Long. keeps you dry
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight material. Easy on and off. Long length. Keeps you dry. Came two in a pack. Great value for the money. Fast delivery. I would buy from this vendor again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality and detailed
reviews.reviewText: That they came in different colors n that the hood had a draw string. So wind doesn't blow it off. Liked so much I bought two more for family members.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for rain
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great product. Pretty sturdy. Just make sure you dry it all the way or it will grow mold
The raincoat had tears in the shoulders. You get what you pay for.
